howItWorks.title: How Webhooks Work
howItWorks.description: Understanding the webhook flow for WhatsApp Business API

step1.title: 1. Configure Webhook in Meta App
step1.description: Go to your Meta App Dashboard → WhatsApp → Configuration → Webhook

step2.title: 2. Set Webhook URL
step2.description: Copy the webhook URL from above and paste it in the Meta App webhook URL field

step3.title: 3. Enter Verify Token
step3.description: Use the verify token shown in your webhook configuration

step4.title: 4. Subscribe to Events
step4.description: Subscribe to messages, message_status, and other required webhook fields

heroSec.animatedBgGreenText: Free WhatsApp Marketing Platform - Bring Your Own API
heroSec.headline: Scale Your Business with
heroSec.subHeadline: Connect your Meta WhatsApp Business API and unlock powerful automation, bulk messaging, and advanced analytics. Start free, scale unlimited.

featuresSec.subHeadline: From bulk messaging to AI chatbots, our platform provides all the tools you need to create successful WhatsApp marketing campaigns

featureTabs.title: Bulk Messaging
featureTabs.description: Send personalized messages to thousands of contacts instantly with smart delivery optimization

featureTabs.title: Automation Workflows
featureTabs.description: Create intelligent automated sequences that nurture leads and engage customers 24/7

featureTabs.title: Advanced Analytics
featureTabs.description: Track performance with real-time insights, delivery reports, and engagement metrics

featureTabs.title: Contact Management
featureTabs.description: Organize and segment your audience with smart tagging and advanced filtering

featureTabs.title: AI Chatbots
featureTabs.description: Deploy intelligent chatbots that handle customer queries and qualify leads automatically

featureTabs.title: Campaign Scheduler
featureTabs.description: Plan and schedule campaigns across time zones with optimal delivery timing

additionalFeatures.title: Multi-language Support
additionalFeatures.desc: Reach global audiences in their native language

additionalFeatures.title: Smart Targeting
additionalFeatures.desc: Precision targeting based on behavior and demographics

additionalFeatures.title: API Integration
additionalFeatures.desc: Seamless integration with your existing tools and CRM

howItWorksSec.subHeadline: Our streamlined onboarding process gets you up and running with WhatsApp marketing faster than any other platform

steps.title: Connect Your Meta API
steps.description: Bring your own WhatsApp Business API from Meta and connect it to our platform in seconds

steps.description: Monitor performance in real-time and optimize your campaigns for better results

useCasesSec.subHeadline: Discover how businesses across different industries are using WhatsApp marketing to drive growth and improve customer engagement

useCases.title: E-commerce
useCases.description: Boost sales with abandoned cart recovery, order updates, and personalized product recommendations

useCases.title: Education
useCases.description: Engage students and parents with course updates, assignment reminders, and educational content

useCases.title: Healthcare
useCases.description: Improve patient care with appointment reminders, health tips, and medication alerts

useCases.title: Real Estate
useCases.description: Connect with prospects through property alerts, virtual tours, and market updates

useCases.title: Restaurants
useCases.description: Increase orders with menu updates, special offers, and reservation confirmations

useCases.title: Automotive
useCases.description: Enhance customer service with service reminders, appointment booking, and vehicle updates

cta.customerSuccessQuote: WhatsApp Pro helped us increase our {industry} engagement by {increase}. The automation features saved us countless hours while improving customer satisfaction.

testimonialsSec.subHeadline: See how businesses across industries are achieving remarkable results with our WhatsApp marketing platform

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: WhatsApp Pro transformed our customer engagement. We saw a 300% increase in cart recovery rates and our customers love the personalized experience.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The automation workflows are incredible. We can now nurture leads 24/7 without any manual intervention. Our conversion rates have never been higher.

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.text: Patient appointment attendance improved dramatically after implementing WhatsApp reminders. The platform is intuitive and our team adopted it quickly.

testimonials.name: David Park
testimonials.text: Our reservation system is now seamless. Customers get instant confirmations and we can send them special offers. Revenue increased by 40% in just 3 months.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.text: Parent engagement has never been better. We can instantly share updates about their children and important school announcements reach everyone.

ctaSec.headline: Ready to Scale Your Business with WhatsApp Marketing?
ctaSec.subHeadline: Start your free trial today. No credit card required. Connect your Meta API and begin sending campaigns in under 5 minutes.

pricingSec.subHeadline: Start free and scale as you grow. All plans include your own Meta API integration and unlimited message sending.

authRequired.title: Authentication Required
authRequired.description: Please login before purchasing a plan

questions.q: Do I need my own WhatsApp Business API?
questions.a: Yes, you need to bring your own Meta WhatsApp Business API. This ensures you have full control over your data and messaging.
No setup fees! You can start using our platform immediately after connecting your API.
Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

questions.q: What happens if I exceed my contact limit?
questions.a: We'll notify you before you reach your limit. You can upgrade your plan or purchase additional contacts.

enterprise.title: Need a Custom Solution?
enterprise.description: Contact our enterprise team for custom pricing, dedicated support, and tailored features
